taxon.author: Berry, Beatty & Prószyński, 1997
taxon.distribution: Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines, Australia (Cocos Is.). Introduced to Seychelles, French Polynesia (Marquesas Is., Society Is.), Fiji

referenceObject.reference: Berry, J. W., Beatty, J. A. & Prószyński, J. (1997). Salticidae of the Pacific Islands. II. Distribution of nine genera, with descriptions of eleven new species. Journal of Arachnology 25: 109-136.
